@graph.description: Dump R documentation and vignettes of R packages into a single file. Supports installed packages, tar.gz archives, and package source directories. If the package is not installed, only its source is automatically downloaded from CRAN for processing. The output is a single plain text file or a 'character', which is useful to ingest complete package documentation into a large language model ('LLM').
@graph.name: rdocdump: Dump 'R' Package Documentation and Vignettes into One File
rdocdump: Dump R Package Documentation and Vignettes into One File
